data: {"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/5SgrtPH6kBmmHao0PofxpvOYfWC.jpg","belongs_to_collection":null,"budget":20000000,"genres":[{"id":18,"name":"Drama"},{"id":80,"name":"Crime"},{"id":53,"name":"Thriller"}],"homepage":"","id":470,"imdb_id":"tt0315733","origin_country":["US"],"original_language":"en","original_title":"21 Grams","overview":"Paul Rivers, an ailing mathematician lovelessly married to an English émigré; Christina Peck, an upper-middle-class suburban housewife and mother of two girls; and Jack Jordan, a born-again ex-con, are brought together by a terrible accident that changes their lives.","popularity":19.655,"poster_path":"/hdS0to9nUpgK0Zm1bZAF6BWRae7.jpg","production_companies":[{"id":10059,"logo_path":null,"name":"This Is That","origin_country":"US"},{"id":10887,"logo_path":null,"name":"Y Productions","origin_country":""},{"id":10888,"logo_path":null,"name":"Mediana Productions Filmgesellschaft","origin_country":""},{"id":10146,"logo_path":"/xnFIOeq5cKw09kCWqV7foWDe4AA.png","name":"Focus Features","origin_country":"US"}],"production_countries":[{"iso_3166_1":"US","name":"United States of America"}],"release_date":"2003-09-06","revenue":60427839,"runtime":124,"spoken_languages":[{"english_name":"English","iso_639_1":"en","name":"English"}],"status":"Released","tagline":"How much does life weigh?","title":"21 Grams","video":false,"vote_average":7.334,"vote_count":3036}
